Package frc.robot

Class OdometrySwerveSystem

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.OdometrySwerveSystem
public class OdometrySwerveSystem extends Object
Odometry system. Calculates an estimate for the robot position on the field.
File: OdometrySwerveSystem.java

Referenceable items: (classes)
OdometrySwerveSystem

Depends on:
none - no external libraries required

Operating system specifics:
None - transportable

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init()
      Initialize the odometry system. Create the pose estimate object, and initialize NT send items. This is only called once during robot startup.

    • Execute

      public static void Execute()
      call this after the drive code is executed. It will update the robot position estimate with new data from the drive system - wheel distances, and gyro angle.

    • updateVision

      public static void updateVision(double visionTime, edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d visionPose)
      call this routine when a new vision measurement is obtained. It updates the position estimate with the new data. The default vision standard deviations set at init are used.
      Parameters:
      visionTime - - double - time stamp of the vision measurement. - seconds.
      visionPose - - Pose2d - robot field position, pose2d, of the vision measurement - M,M,Rad

    • updateVision

      public static void updateVision(double visionTime, edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d visionPose, edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix<edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N3,edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1> stdDev)
      call this routine when a new vision measurement is obtained. It updates the position estimate with the new data. This call includes updated standard deviations for the estimated vision pose.
      Parameters:
      visionTime - - double - time stamp of the vision measurement. - seconds.
      visionPose - - Pose2d - robot field position, pose2d, of the vision measurement - M,M,Rad
      stdDev - - Matrix<N3,N1> - new standard deviations for this vision measurement.

    • getXPosition

      public static double getXPosition()
      get robot absolute X field position.
      Returns:
      fieldXPosition - double - robots estimated X position - meters.

    • getYPosition

      public static double getYPosition()
      get robot absolute Y field position.
      Returns:
      fieldYPosition - double - robots estimated Y position - meters.

    • getRotPosition

      public static double getRotPosition()
      get orientation angle of robot absolute field position.
      Returns:
      fieldOrientationAngle - double - robots estimated absoluteorientation angle - radians.

    • getPose

      public static edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d getPose()
      get estimated absolute field position based on drive wheel, gyro, and vision position odometry.
      Returns:
      locPose - Pose2d - estimated absolute field position.

    • getExecElapsedTimeMilli

      public static double getExecElapsedTimeMilli()
      get execute time for the last iteration of execute method.
      Returns:
      locElapsedTimeMilli - double - elapsed execution time - milliseconds.

    • setStartingPose

      public static void setStartingPose(double x_M, double y_M, double rot_RAD)
      Set starting Pose. This can be called repeatedly if desired before the competition starts. It should not be called after the competition starts.
      Parameters:
      x_M - - double - robot x position on field - meters
      y_M - - double - robot y position on field - meters
      rot_RAD - - double - robot orientation angle on field - Radians.
